---
title: "index.js"
---

## High-level description
This code exports two modules from the `tar-stream` package: `extract` and `pack`. It serves as the main entry point for the `tar-stream` library, providing access to functionality for extracting and packing tar archives.

## Symbols

### `exports.extract`
#### Description
This line exports the `extract` module from the `./extract` file. The `extract` module likely provides functionality for extracting contents from tar archives.

#### Inputs
Not applicable (this is an export statement)

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| extract | module | The exported module for extracting tar archives |

### `exports.pack`
#### Description
This line exports the `pack` module from the `./pack` file. The `pack` module likely provides functionality for creating and packing tar archives.

#### Inputs
Not applicable (this is an export statement)

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| pack | module | The exported module for packing tar archives |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| ./extract | Provides the extract functionality for tar archives |
| ./pack | Provides the pack functionality for tar archives |

This simple index file acts as a central point for accessing the main functionalities of the `tar-stream` package, making it easy for users to import and use the `extract` and `pack` modules in their projects.
